alarm.name: Connection with site lost
alarm.remedialAction: Choose another site or contact site administrator

alarm.name: Ethernet down
alarm.probableCause: A network element is down (switch, CPL, ...)
alarm.remedialAction: Check Ethernet network elements state and restart those which are down

alarm.name: Wifi down
alarm.probableCause: Wifi down on the router or on the computer, or external jamming

alarm.name: Internet down
alarm.probableCause: Router down, or no more signal on the WAN connection on the router, or provider issue

alarm.name: Local area network down
alarm.probableCause: Router down, or switch is down, or a device jams the network
alarm.additionalInfo: Should not occur when the router is in the monitored equipments list
alarm.remedialAction: Restart router, check network components, check if a connected device is jamming

alarm.name: Network down
alarm.probableCause: A device jams the network, or router down
alarm.remedialAction: Check if a connected device is jamming, restart router

alarm.name: Ethernet unstable
alarm.probableCause: A network element is not working properly (switch, CPL, ...)
alarm.remedialAction: Check Ethernet network elements state and restart those which are not wrking properly

alarm.name: Wifi unstable
alarm.probableCause: External jamming, or access point too far, or walls too thick

alarm.name: Internet unstable
alarm.probableCause: Router not working properly, or provider issue

alarm.name: Local area network unstable
alarm.probableCause: Router down, or switch is down, or a device jams the network
alarm.remedialAction: Restart router, check network components, check if a connected device is jamming

alarm.name: Network unstable
alarm.probableCause: A device jams the network, or router down
alarm.remedialAction: Check if a connected device is jamming, restart router
